app package

Submodules

app.api module

chat.app.api

app.api.analyst_login()[source]
purpose: handle analyst login event

add nickname and current timestamp into the (sorted) online analyst list which is ordered by timestamp

app.api.analyst_logout()[source]
purpose: handle analyst logout event

analyst will not be able to logout untill all chat rooms have been closed

app.api.client_login()[source]
purpose: handle client login event

if client is not online, add nickname into the online clients list if client is online, continue the existing conversations

app.api.client_logout()[source]
purpose: handle client logout event

if client is online, remove nickname from the online clients list if any chat room is open, close it deactive the session

app.api.get_me()[source]

purpose: check whoami in the session

app.api.get_messages()[source]
purpose: for clients, retrieve all messages from their own room

for analysts, retrieve all messages from all active rooms

app.api.index()[source]
app.api.login_required(fn)[source]
app.api.pop_messages()[source]

purpose: retrieve all messages from their own room(s) then remove all the messages

app.api.send_msg()[source]
purpose: send a message from current logged in user (client or analyst) into the room

if requesting user is a client, as only one unique room is opened for him/her, roomid can be determined directly, hence no need to read data if requesting user is an analyst, as he/she may have joined multiple rooms, target client must be specified, hence need to get this information from data

app.redis_utils module

chat.app.redis_utils

app.redis_utils.end_chat(nickname: str) → int[source]

purpose: close a (private) chat room, only client can close the chat room

app.redis_utils.get_messages(room_id: str) → List[str][source]

purpose: retrieve all messages from a given room

app.redis_utils.get_rooms(user_type: str, nickname: str) → List[str][source]

purpose: retrieve all chat rooms the user is currently joined

app.redis_utils.go_offline(user_type: str, nickname: str) → int[source]

purpose: utility function for logout operation

app.redis_utils.initiate_chat(nickname: str) → Tuple[int, str][source]

purpose: create a (private) chat room, if any analyst is online

app.redis_utils.message_add(message: dict) → int[source]

purpose: add a new message into the data store :output: the number of new elements added

app.redis_utils.pop_messages(room_id: str) → List[str][source]

purpose: retrieve all messages from a given room, then remove all messages

app.redis_utils.publish(room_id: str, from_: str, message: str) → None[source]

purpose: publish message

app.redis_utils.refresh_online_status(user_type: str, nickname: str) → int[source]

purpose: refresh online status

app.redis_utils.subscribe_room(room_id: str, pubsub: object) → None[source]

purpose: handle message formatting, etc.
